page.title: 05 Parents Occupations
page.content:
We surveyed the school to find out the occupations of the children's parents. We found out that out of 64 children we interviewed,{18.75%}of their fathers worked at Silverton paper mill. Then we worked out that {6.25%}of the fathers worked on farms. The third most popular job, office work, came out as{4.7%.
With the mothers' occupations the most common job was that of housewife. We worked out the percentage as{ {29.7%.}Nurses, and the four people who worked with foods, had the same percentage of{6.25%.}So now we have found out that being a housewife is the most popular job for mothers but with fathers, working in the paper mill was the most common job.
